mapper.select: select p.product_id, c.category_name, p.product_name, p.hq_supply_price, sum(hq.hq_quantity) as hq_quantity from product p join category c on p.category_id=c.category_id join product_batch b on p.product_id=b.product_id join hq_inventory hq on hq.batch_id=b.batch_id group by p.product_id, c.category_name, p.product_name, p.hq_supply_price order by p.product_name
